name: Dr.Senthil Kumaran V
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  - M. K. University   - 1991M.Sc  - M. K. University   - 1995M.Tech  ( Computer Science ) M.Phil  ( Object Oriented Analysis  )  - Bharathiar University Ph.D  ( Faculty of Scienece and Humanities )  - PSG College of Technology  - 08/22/2014Supervisor: Sankar A
in_brief:
Dr.V.Senthil kumaran has more than more than 20 years of teaching experience. He guided 15 M.Phil scholars and more than 150 MCA, M.Sc (SE) and M.Sc(TCS) Projects.
He is the member of ISTE, Computer Society of India. He has visited Tajen university, Taiwan during October 2013 to present a paper
in international conference.He has attended many Staff Development Programmes, Workshops, Conferences and Awareness Programmes.
He is the reviewer of Tata McGraw Hill publications. Currently, he is the department lab in-charge.
research_areas: Service Oriented Architecture and Web Services
